IT Technician,
EHVERT ENGINEERING
Toronto, ON, CANADA  1 Position(s)
Posted Feb 18, 2010


IT Consultant- Full-time - Toronto

Ehvert Engineering provides IT consulting, Communications, Electrical and Mechanical engineering to large organizations in a multi-vendor environment.  Our services include network & systems integration, wireless network engineering, systems management, security planning and audits, technical support, fibre/cable plant design, providing outsourced IT services and technology relocation.  We are continuing to grow and are looking for an IT Consultant to join our team.

Your role would be the following:

·          Perform the role of Ehvert's technical team lead during Ehvert's larger migration projects for both desktop and server migrations working closely with both Ehvert's clients and Ehvert project manager
·          Provide primary onsite support for Ehvert's small and medium client base (The technology deployed at small and medium clients typically consist of Windows 2000 / XP servers and workstations, Exchange  2000, 2003 and XP, small routers and firewalls)
·          Participate and be the primary consultant in the development of the recommendations and fee proposals for the small and medium clients
·          Implement and managed technical solutions for Ehvert's small and medium clients
·          Primary systems architect for Ehvert's Internal network and systems
·          Assist in supporting Ehvert's internal day to day IT requirements
·          Provide rotational pager support required for Ehvert's network
·          Actively participate in the architectural design and implementation of Ehvert's network

We are looking for a candidate with a strong technical knowledge, good attention to details, and the ability to work on multi concurrent project while delivering the highest quality of work. The successful candidate will have a minimum of 5 years hand-on technical experience in the IT field as well as experience with the core suite of Microsoft products including Microsoft Exchange. Previous project type experience is an asset but not a requirement.

The successful candidate will be a confident self-starter who has excellent organizational and communication skills and is very detail oriented.  We are looking for candidates who are willing to take the initiative, are knowledgeable about technology and can work in a self managed environment.

For more information about Ehvert Engineering, please visit our website at www.ehvert.com.  If you are interested in applying, please send your resume to careers@ehvert.com.

Due to the volume of resumes we receive, we regret that only qualified candidates will be contacted.  Thank you for your interest in Ehvert Engineering, we look forward to receiving your resume!
